entry.transcription: Today we discussed the new project timeline and assigned tasks to team members. John will handle the backend development while Sarah focuses on the frontend. We agreed to have daily standups at 9 AM starting next week.
entry.summary: Team meeting about project timeline and task assignments with daily standup schedule.

entry.transcription: Quick voice memo: Remember to follow up with the client about the contract revisions. They mentioned concerns about the delivery date in section 3.2. Need to prepare a response by end of day tomorrow.
entry.summary: Voice memo reminder about client contract follow-up regarding delivery date concerns.

entry.transcription: Interview with candidate for senior developer position. Strong background in Python and cloud infrastructure. Good communication skills, asked thoughtful questions about team culture. Recommend moving forward to technical assessment.
entry.summary: Senior developer interview notes with positive recommendation for technical assessment.

entry.transcription: Brainstorming session for the new mobile app feature. Ideas discussed: offline mode, push notifications for updates, dark theme support, and integration with calendar apps. Priority should be offline mode based on user feedback.
entry.summary: Mobile app feature brainstorm prioritizing offline mode based on user feedback.

entry.transcription: Personal note about the book I just finished reading. Main takeaways: importance of deep work, time blocking techniques, and reducing digital distractions. Want to implement the two-hour focus block strategy starting Monday.
entry.summary: Reading notes on productivity book with plan to implement focus block strategy.
